titleStmt.title: By the Quene the Quenes Maiestie vnderstandyng that where of late the peece of golde called the pistolet was made currant at fyue shyllynges and ten pence ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Richard Iugge and Iohn Cawood, printers to the Quenes Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Formerly STC 7919. Line 1 of text ends "late". Space for the cut of second coin left blank, with cut from 7920 pasted over ms. "apologie".
Other title information from first 3 lines of text.
"Anno 1560. 2. Novembris. The seconde yere of her Maiesties raigne."
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
